content:
I'll provide you with the exact commands to commit and push the updated deploy.yml file to the GitHub repository. These commands are designed for Mac Terminal and can be copy-pasted directly:

```bash
# Navigate to the repository directory (adjust if your path is different)
cd ~/palios-taey-nova

# Make sure you're on the main branch
git checkout main

# Pull latest changes to avoid conflicts
git pull

# Add the updated workflow file
git add .github/workflows/deploy.yml

# Commit the changes
git commit -m "Fix: Update GitHub Actions workflow to resolve Docker buildx errors"

# Push the changes to GitHub
git push origin main
```

This will trigger the workflow automatically since we configured it to run on pushes to the main branch. After running these commands, you can monitor the workflow execution in the GitHub Actions tab of the repository.

Let me know once you've pushed the changes, and we'll monitor the workflow execution together to ensure it resolves the buildx error.
